name: sarajevo
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

This walnut table spans almost 7 feet in length by increasing in thickness towards the center. I reference the underside of this table as having "food belly”. In addition the chromed steel legs are constructed as one continuous loop, nesting in a groove along the undersides and then jutting down on a slight incline to become the hairpin legs. 

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
34.5"W x 80"L x 30"H

name: noonan lounge
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Designed to imitate the feeling of a hammock, yet in seated form, steel creates a sculptural frame that interpolates the parabolic curve of the hanging leather used on this lounge chair.

The 1/4-inch cold rolled steel frame has been sealed with a matte wax finish to arrest rusting. Leather hide is hand sown with white thread and has a burnished edge finish.

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
29"W x 41"L x 26"H

name: tilted trio planters
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Hand-shaped from recycled steel, these clean, smart steel planters allow desert life to flourish in the most unexpected of places. Grouped together and placed on a table, shelf or countertop, the Tilted Trio Planters are undoubtedly a captivating conversation piece. 

The "tilted trio"  are designed with zero waste in the process. Like a puzzle you can stack these into a single object. 

These planters are designed without drain holes. With that, cacti and other desert plant life are best suited for these planters. However, if a drain hole is desired, you may request one in each planter. 

To ensure these pieces do not rust as you water your plants, the interiors are coated with a clear, waterproof sealant. The exterior surfaces are left with the natural black mill finish and a clear wax coating to prevent rusting.

*cacti not included

3.5" DIA x 6" T
3.5" DIA x 3.5" T
3.5" DIA x 2.5" T

name: matchmaker
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

With all matches, there’s a common bond. Glue that holds the entities together, if you will. This piece doesn’t make use of that. Instead, seven steel rods thread themselves through the locally sourced wood, evermore holding the pieces together. While each piece brings its own dimensions to the table – as seen on the underside – the surface remains flush and level. 

Between the wood, 1/4-inch flat steel turns down on the ends to form the thin legs. To prevent rusting, the steel legs are coated with a clear polyurethane coating. The wood is coated with a matte finished paste wax for protection.

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
26"W x 80"L x 30"H

name: skin & bones
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

When I was a kid, my classmates used to taunt me for being “all skin and bones.” This chair embraces the childhood chastising, creating inspired beauty and comfort. 

This ultra-comfortable slug leather and steel frame chair is the epitome of minimal design, with the 5/8 inch cold rolled steel frame acting as the bones and the tanned and oiled leather hide being the skin. The frame is powder coated with a hand-polished bronze coating for superior durability.

Designed much like a coiled spring this lounge will adjust to you depending on your weight when sat in. The hides slide right over the frame for easy removal, making it perfect for those who want to cat-sit, but don’t want their leather scratched up.

30"W x 30"L x 30"H

name: bunky minimalist stool
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Custom designed for the small space of a dressing room, this modern stool is simple, elegant and light, keeping any space it's added to airy and inviting. The steel lines curve and sweep to form this visually intriguing and physically sturdy piece of furniture.

Two smooth black leather straps are inlaid into the natural birch wood, and secure the seat to the exuberantly bent black steel legs of the stool. If you're not in love with this minimalistic stool at first sight, you will be at first touch.

To ensure rusting will not occur, the steel used on this modern stool is heat-treated and sealed with wax. However, if you'd prefer rusted steel, please send me a note when placing your order.

14.25”W x 18.5”L x 16”H

name: bunky day to night stool
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product

A clothing rack, cup holder, purse hook and seat all built in to a simple, sleek stool. Intended to pack functionality into the small, compact space of a dressing room, this custom design offers superior details. 

Addressing all the needs one has while trying on clothes, the stool features an indent for hanging a purse, a steel rack to drape clothing over and a cup holder to keep beverages secure and safe from spilling.

Nestled into the natural birch wood are two smooth black leather straps, securing the seat to the playfully bent black steel legs of the stool.

The steel used on this modern stool is heat-treated and sealed with wax. Rusting will not occur with wax application. If you'd prefer a worn-in look and would like a rust finish, please send me a note when placing your order.

14.25”W x 21”L x 28.5”H (16" seat height)

name: slant planter
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Hand-shaped from recycled steel, this clean, smart steel planter allows desert life to flourish in the most unexpected of places. Placed on a table, shelf or countertop, the Slant Planter is undoubtedly a captivating conversation piece. 

These planters are designed without drain holes. With that, a cactus or another type of desert plant is best suited for this planter. However, if a drain hole is desired, you may request one. 

To ensure this piece does not rust as you water your plant, the interior of the planter is coated with a clear, waterproof sealant. The exterior surface is left with the natural black mill finish and a clear wax coating to prevent rusting.

*cactus not included

3.5" DIA x 6" T

name: lean planter
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Hand-shaped from recycled steel, this clean, smart steel planter allows desert life to flourish in the most unexpected of places. Placed on a table, shelf or countertop, the Lean Planter is undoubtedly a captivating conversation piece. 

These planters are designed without drain holes. With that, a cactus or another type of desert plant is best suited for this planter. However, if a drain hole is desired, you may request one. 

To ensure this piece does not rust as you water your plant, the interior of the planter is coated with a clear, waterproof sealant. The exterior surface is left with the natural black mill finish and a clear wax coating to prevent rusting.

*cactus not included

3.5" DIA x 3.5" T

name: skew planter
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Hand-shaped from recycled steel, this clean, smart steel planter allows desert life to flourish in the most unexpected of places. Placed on a table, shelf or countertop, the Skew Planter is undoubtedly a captivating conversation piece. 

These planters are designed without drain holes. With that, a cactus or another type of desert plant is best suited for this planter. However, if a drain hole is desired, you may request one. 

To ensure this piece does not rust as you water your plant, the interior of the planter is coated with a clear, waterproof sealant. The exterior surface is left with the natural black mill finish and a clear wax coating to prevent rusting.

*cactus not included

3.5" DIA x 2.5" T

name: sonora
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Levitating four inches above the ground, a rolled-and-welded steel tube frame matched with two rolled struts lays the foundation for relaxation in this distinctive chaise lounge. Whether it’s set against a sparkling pool or nestled in a desert landscape, your mind is free to drift.

Hand-wrapped in 100 yards of thin Sisal twine, a hand-stitched tanned leather cushion provides a subtle, yet stunning contrast, and is secured along the top and bottom rail of the steel frame. If a different location is desired for added comfort, the leather cushion’s location is adjustable.

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
77"L x 29"W x 20"H

name: tieton
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Whether it’s the sound of a captivating book’s pages turning, the melody of a TV show’s theme song or the click-clack of a laptop’s keyboard, it’s easy to become enthralled in what one’s doing while lounging in strung out. 

The wood frame, creating both the legs and the support for the seat and back, was carved from locally sourced mesquite, and as a contrast to the warm wood, cold-rolled steel is bent to create a strong, yet naturally kinetic frame. Made with the utmost attention to detail, 1,500 feet of Jute twine wraps itself around the frame to create the sink-into-and-relax surface.

This chair can also be flat-packed into a small box and easily reassembled, allowing for a reduction in shipping costs while still providing a superior, one-of-a-kind design. 

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
29"W x 26"L x 29"H

name: roosevelt
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product. 

Our work lives are often nothing but complex and hairy, but to force one to de-clutter and organize, l'éditeur offers three long, simple storage trays and a clean, sleek, built-in steel magazine rack. The modern, handmade desk joins cool, black steel and light, warm birch to create a compelling juxtaposition of unwavering structure and organic elements.

I build to order and don't usually have an item in stock. 
24"W x 60"L x 29"H

name: copenhagen "limited edition"
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

(limited edition- this is the only one that will be made.)

Hand-wrapped in 1/8 inch cotton cord and designed intentionally to impose relaxation, this piece provides a superlative lounging experience. For use either indoors or outside, and with its simple, uncluttered look, moo.less’ best uses are for deep thinking, intellectual conversations and stargazing. 

The simple steel frame has been pre-rusted and sealed. It’s natural for rusting to occur, so if that is not desired, apply a new wax coating once each year. This edition is 28.5 inches wide, 43 inches long and 24 inches tall.

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
28.5”W x 43”L x 24”H

name: modesto
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Designed to imitate the feeling of a hammock, yet in seated form, blackened steel creates a sculptural frame that matches the parabolic curve of the hanging cowhide used on this lounge chair. 

The 1/4-inch steel frame has been sealed with a matte wax finish to arrest rusting. Additional cowhides are available upon request. See images.

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
29"W x 41"L x 26"H

name: tangled light
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Hand crafted with recycled cotton cord, dipped in a soothing amber-hued resin and then meticulously cured for three weeks; the end result creates an enchanting ambiance. Inside or outdoors. It looks charming hanging above a porch or elicits a calm, warm atmosphere in indoor living spaces.

tangled light can be configured as a hanging pendant, floor lamp or desk light, as it can be customized to any desired length. Your order includes a compact florescent light bulb, which is recommend for this product. 

I build to order and don’t usually have items in stock.
5”D x 33”H

name: sleek TP
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Sleek TP has a simple and elegant aesthetic for an object we usually disdain. 

This sleek, handmade toilet paper holder is made with hot-rolled blackened steel with a wax finish to arrest rusting. This design can also be customized to fit paper towels or other rolls of paper.

Mount on the wall, put a new roll in and slip the notched holder to secure it in place. Then you're ready to get down to business.

Dimensions 
1.5" W x 5.5" L x 5" H

name: tipsy wine holder
description:
A first edition benjamin hall design+build product.

Giving it the illusion of tipping over, or acting tipsy, if you will, the thick steel pipe that provides sanctuary for your vino is balanced accordingly to stabilize a wine bottle on a skewed angle.

Whether it's the centerpiece holding your full-bodied Cabernet on your dining room table or it's chilled and becomes a cold home for a bottle of Pinot Grigio on a restaurant table, reaching to pour another glass will be more delightful than ever.

The steel edges of this distinctive wine holder are ground down and polished, while the exterior surface is heat-treated and sealed with a clear matte wax to prevent rusting.

*wine not included ;)
3.5" DIA x 6" T
